entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, a young wizard who has been tempted by Voldemort but remains pure of heart.

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, a dark wizard who is trying to possess Harry's soul.

entities.name: ministry
entities.description: A government-like institution that deals with magical affairs.

relationships.description: Harry has been tempted by Voldemort, but remains pure of heart.
Harry's soul was involved in a situation at the Ministry where Voldemort tried to possess him.
Voldemort has tried to possess Harry's soul, but was unable to do so without enduring mortal agony.
Voldemort was involved in a situation at the Ministry where he tried to possess Harry's soul.
